title: Character Search App
description: The app leverages the Rick and Morty API to fetch character data and presents it in a user-friendly interface.

title: React UI
description: A website using React, react DOM, react router DOM, react-icons, react-responsive-carousel, react-router-hash-link,sass

title: Weather App
description: The Weather App is a simple web application that allows users to view weather information for different cities.

title: Dictionary App
description: The App allows users to search for the meaning, part of speech, example sentences, antonyms, synonyms, and additional information about a given word.

title: Loan Calculator
description: The app allows users to calculate their mortgage loan details based on the input values for home value, down payment, interest rate, and loan term.

title: To-Do App
description: The app allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks with their respective due dates and descriptions. Tasks are stored in the browser's localStorage.
